ess-beta-metadata.label: Gross disposable household income per head
ess-beta-metadata.subtitle: Average income per person (Â£) after taxes and direct benefits
ess-beta-metadata.longDescription: This indicator shows an estimate of the amount of money each individual within a household has available for spending or saving after they have paid taxes and received any direct benefits, in pounds, in the UK, for 1997 to 2023.
ess-beta-metadata.caveats: Figures for 2023 are provisional, as national estimates have not been through supply and use balancing at the time of the data source publication.
